Package controllers

package controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CashierController
    Controller for cashier-side operations in the POS system.
    HomeController
    Controller for the home screen of the POS system.
    InventoryAddDeleteController
    Controller for the Add/Delete Inventory popup in the Manager Dashboard.
    InventoryController
    Controller for the Inventory screen in the POS system.
    ItemController
    Controller for the Item customization view in the cashier interface.
    ManageEmployeeController
    Controller for managing employee records in the POS system.
    MenuController
    Controller for the Menu Management screen in the POS system.
    NewItemController
    Controller for creating and editing menu items in the POS system.
    StatisticsController
    Controller for the manager-facing Order History and Statistics screen.
    StatisticsController.OrderRow
    View-model representing a single order row in the Orders table.
    StatisticsController.PURow
    View-model representing product usage by inventory item for a given period.
    StatisticsController.SalesByItemRow
    View-model representing sales metrics grouped by item (or category).
    StatisticsController.XReportRow
    View-model representing hourly X-Report metrics for a specific day.
